Judgment.description: If the user is holding a appropriate plate or drive, the damage inflicted will match it.

Bug Bite.description: If target has a berry, inflicts double damage and uses the berry.

Charge Beam.description: Has a 70% chance to raise the user’s Special Attack by one stage.

Wood Hammer.description: User receives 1/3 the damage inflicted in recoil.

Aqua Jet.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Attack Order.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

Defend Order.description: Raises the user’s Defense and Special Defense by one stage.

Heal Order.description: Heals the user by half its max HP.

Head Smash.description: User receives 1/2 the damage inflicted in recoil.

Roar Of Time.description: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.

Spacial Rend.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

Lunar Dance.description: User faints, and its replacement is fully healed.

Crush Grip.description: Power increases against targets with more HP remaining, up to a maximum of 121 power.

Magma Storm.description: Prevents the target from fleeing and inflicts damage for 2-5 turns.

Seed Flare.description: Has a 40% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by two stages.

Ominous Wind.description: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

Shadow Force.description: User vanishes, dodging all attacks, and hits next turn.  Hits through Protect and Detect.

Hone Claws.description: Raises the user’s Attack and accuracy by one stage.

Wide Guard.description: Prevents any multi-target moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.

Guard Split.description: Averages Defense and Special Defense with the target.

Power Split.description: Averages Attack and Special Attack with the target.

Wonder Room.description: All Pokémon’s Defense and Special Defense are swapped for 5 turns.

Psyshock.description: Inflicts damage based on the target’s Defense, not Special Defense.

Venoshock.description: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

Autotomize.description: Raises the user’s Speed by two stages and halves the user’s weight.

Rage Powder.description: Redirects the target’s single-target effects to the user for this turn.

Telekinesis.description: Moves have 100% accuracy against the target for three turns.

Magic Room.description: Negates held items for five turns.

Smack Down.description: Removes any immunity to Ground damage.

Flame Burst.description: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

Sludge Wave.description: Has a 10% chance to poison the target.

Quiver Dance.description: Raises the user’s Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.

Heavy Slam.description: Power is higher when the user weighs more than the target, up to a maximum of 120.

Synchronoise.description: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.

Electro Ball.description: Power is higher when the user has greater Speed than the target, up to a maximum of 150.

Soak.description: Changes the target’s type to Water.

Flame Charge.description: Inflicts regular damage.  Raises the user’s Speed by one stage.

Coil.description: Raises the user’s Attack, Defense, and accuracy by one stage each.

Simple Beam.description: Changes the target’s ability to Simple.

Entrainment.description: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.

Round.description: Has double power if it’s used more than once per turn.

Echoed Voice.description: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

Stored Power.description: Power is higher the more the user’s stats have been raised, to a maximum of 31×.

Hex.description: Has double power if the target has a major status ailment.

Retaliate.description: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

Final Gambit.description: Inflicts damage equal to the user’s remaining HP.  User faints.

Inferno.description: Has a 100% chance to burn the target.

Dire Claw.description: The user lashes out at the target with ruinous claws, aiming to land a critical hit. This may also leave the target poisoned, paralyzed, or drowsy.

Psyshield Bash.description: Cloaking itself in psychic energy, the user slams into the target. This may also raise the user’s defensive stats.

Stone Axe.description: The user swings its stone axes at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Stone splinters left behind by this attack continue to damage the target for several turns.

Springtide Storm.description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds brimming with love and hate. This move’s additional effects depend on the user’s form.

Mystical Power.description: The user strengthens itself with a mysterious power. If it excels in offense, its offensive stats are raised. If it excels in defense, its defensive stats are raised.

Raging Fury.description: The user rampages and spews vicious flames to inflict damage on the target, then becomes fixated on using this move.

Wave Crash.description: The user shrouds itself in water and slams into the target with its whole body to inflict damage. This also damages the user and raises the user’s action speed.

Chloroblast.description: The user launches its amassed chlorophyll to inflict damage on the target. This also damages the user and lowers the user's action speed.

Mountain Gale.description: The user hurls giant chunks of ice at the target to inflict damage.

Victory Dance.description: The user performs a dance to usher in victory. This raises the user’s offensive and defensive stats and increases the damage dealt by the user’s moves by 50 percent.

Headlong Rush.description: The user smashes into the target in a full-body tackle. This also lowers the user’s defensive stats.

Barb Barrage.description: The user launches countless toxic barbs to inflict damage. This may also poison the target. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Esper Wing.description: The user slashes the target with aura-enriched wings. This also raises the user's action speed. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Bitter Malice.description: The user attacks its target with spine-chilling resentment. This may also leave the target with frostbite. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Shelter.description: The user makes its skin as hard as an iron shield, raising its defensive stats. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

Triple Arrows.description: The user delivers an axe kick, then fires three arrows. This raises the chance of its future attacks landing critical hits and also lowers the target's defensive stats.

Infernal Parade.description: The user attacks with myriad fireballs. This may also leave the target with a burn. This move's power is doubled if the target has a status condition.

Ceaseless Edge.description: The user slashes its shell blade at the target, aiming to land a critical hit. Shell splinters left behind by this attack will continue to damage the target for several turns.

Bleakwind Storm.description: The user attacks with savagely cold winds that cause both body and spirit to tremble. This may also leave the target with frostbite.

Wildbolt Storm.description: The user summons a thunderous tempest and savagely attacks with lightning and wind. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

Sandsear Storm.description: The user attacks by wrapping the target in fierce winds and searingly hot sand. This also leaves the target with a burn.

Lunar Blessing.description: The user heals its own status conditions and restores its HP. Incoming moves also become more likely to miss.

Take Heart.description: The user lifts its spirits, healing its own status conditions and raising its offensive and defensive stats.

Tera Blast.description: If the user has Terastallized, it unleashes energy of its Tera Type. This move inflicts damage using the Attack or Sp. Atk stat—whichever is higher for the user.

Silk Trap.description: The user spins a silken trap, protecting itself from damage while lowering the Speed stat of any attacker that makes direct contact.

Axe Kick.description: The user attacks by kicking up into the air and slamming its heel down upon the target. This may also confuse the target. If it misses, the user takes damage instead.

Last Respects.description: The user attacks to avenge its allies. The more defeated allies there are in the user's party, the greater the move's power.

Lumina Crash.description: The user attacks by unleashing a peculiar light that even affects the mind. This also harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

Order Up.description: The user attacks with elegant poise. If the user has a Tatsugiri in its mouth, this move boosts one of the user's stats based on the Tatsugiri's form.

Jet Punch.description: The user summons a torrent around its fist and punches at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

Spicy Extract.description: The user emits an incredibly spicy extract, sharply boosting the target's Attack stat and harshly lowering the target's Defense stat.

Spin Out.description: The user spins furiously by straining its legs, inflicting damage on the target. This also harshly lowers the user's Speed stat.

Population Bomb.description: The user’s fellows gather in droves to perform a combo attack that hits the target one to ten times in a row.

Ice Spinner.description: The user covers its feet in thin ice and twirls around, slamming into the target. This move's spinning motion also destroys the terrain.

Glaive Rush.description: The user throws its entire body into a reckless charge. After this move is used, attacks on the user cannot miss and will inflict double damage until the user’s next turn.

Revival Blessing.description: The user bestows a loving blessing, reviving a party Pokémon that has fainted and restoring half that Pokémon's max HP.

Salt Cure.description: The user salt cures the target, inflicting damage every turn. Steel and Water types are more strongly affected by this move.

Triple Dive.description: The user performs a perfectly timed triple dive, hitting the target with splashes of water three times in a row.

Mortal Spin.description: The user performs a spin attack that can also eliminate the effects of such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also poisons opposing Pokémon.

Doodle.description: The user captures the very essence of the target in a sketch. This changes the Abilities of the user and its ally Pokémon to that of the target.

Fillet Away.description: The user sharply boosts its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats by using its own HP.

Kowtow Cleave.description: The user slashes at the target after kowtowing to make the target let down its guard. This attack never misses.

Flower Trick.description: The user throws a rigged bouquet of flowers at the target. This attack never misses and always lands a critical hit.

Torch Song.description: The user blows out raging flames as if singing a song, scorching the target. This also boosts the user's Sp. Atk stat.

Aqua Step.description: The user toys with the target and attacks it using light and fluid dance steps. This also boosts the user's Speed stat.

Raging Bull.description: The user performs a tackle like a raging bull. This move's type depends on the user's form. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

Make It Rain.description: The user attacks by throwing out a mass of coins. This also lowers the user's Sp. Atk stat. Money is earned after the battle.

Psyblade.description: The user rends the target with an ethereal blade. This move's power is boosted by 50 percent if the user is on Electric Terrain.

Hydro Steam.description: The user blasts the target with boiling-hot water. This move's power is not lowered in harsh sunlight but rather boosted by 50 percent.

Ruination.description: The user summons a ruinous disaster. This cuts the target’s HP in half.

Collision Course.description: The user transforms and crashes to the ground, causing a massive prehistoric explosion. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it’s a supereffective hit.

Electro Drift.description: The user races forward at ultrafast speeds, piercing its target with futuristic electricity. This move's power is boosted more than usual if it's a supereffective hit.

Shed Tail.description: The user creates a substitute for itself using its own HP before switching places with a party Pokémon in waiting.

Tidy Up.description: The user tidies up and removes the effects of Spikes, Stealth Rock, Sticky Web, Toxic Spikes, and Substitute. This also boosts the user’s Attack and Speed stats.

Snowscape.description: The user summons a snowstorm lasting five turns. This boosts the Defense stats of Ice types.

Pounce.description: The user attacks by pouncing on the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat.

Trailblaze.description: The user attacks suddenly as if leaping out from tall grass. The user's nimble footwork boosts its Speed stat.

Chilling Water.description: The user attacks the target by showering it with water that's so cold it saps the target's power. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

Hyper Drill.description: The user spins the pointed part of its body at high speed to pierce the target. This attack can hit a target using a move such as Protect or Detect.

Twin Beam.description: The user shoots mystical beams from its eyes to inflict damage. The target is hit twice in a row.

Rage Fist.description: The user converts its rage into energy to attack. The more times the user has been hit by attacks, the greater the move's power.

Armor Cannon.description: The user shoots its own armor out as blazing projectiles. This also lowers the user’s Defense and Sp. Def stats.

Bitter Blade.description: The user focuses its bitter feelings toward the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target.

Double Shock.description: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

Gigaton Hammer.description: The user swings its whole body around to attack with its huge hammer. This move can't be used twice in a row.

Comeuppance.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

Aqua Cutter.description: The user expels pressurized water to cut at the target like a blade. This move has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Blood Moon.description: The user unleashes the full brunt of its spirit from a full moon that shines as red as blood. This move can't be used twice in a row.

Matcha Gotcha.description: The user fires a blast of tea that it mixed. The user's HP is restored by up to half the damage taken by the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

Syrup Bomb.description: The user sets off an explosion of sticky candy syrup, which coats the target and causes the target's Speed stat to drop each turn for three turns.

Ivy Cudgel.description: The user strikes with an ivy-wrapped cudgel. This move's type changes depending on the mask worn by the user, and it has a heightened chance of landing a critical hit.

Electro Shot.description: The user gathers electricity on the first turn, boosting its Sp. Atk stat, then fires a high-voltage shot on the next turn. The shot will be fired immediately in rain.

Tera Starstorm.description: With the power of its crystals, the user bombards and eliminates the target. When used by Terapagos in its Stellar Form, this move damages all opposing Pokémon.

Fickle Beam.description: The user shoots a beam of light to inflict damage. Sometimes all the user's heads shoot beams in unison, doubling the move's power.

Burning Bulwark.description: The user's intensely hot fur protects it from attacks and also burns any attacker that makes direct contact with it.

Thunderclap.description: This move enables the user to attack first with a jolt of electricity. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

Mighty Cleave.description: The user wields the light that has accumulated atop its head to cleave the target. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

Tachyon Cutter.description: The user attacks by launching particle blades at the target twice in a row. This attack never misses.

Hard Press.description: The target is crushed with an arm, a claw, or the like to inflict damage. The more HP the target has left, the greater the move's power.

Dragon Cheer.description: The user raises its allies’ morale with a draconic cry so that their future attacks have a heightened chance of landing critical hits. This rouses Dragon types more.

Alluring Voice.description: The user attacks the target using its angelic voice. This also confuses the target if its stats have been boosted during the turn.

Temper Flare.description: Spurred by desperation, the user attacks the target. This move's power is doubled if the user's previous move failed.

Supercell Slam.description: The user electrifies its body and drops onto the target to inflict damage. If this move misses, the user takes damage instead.

Psychic Noise.description: The user attacks the target with unpleasant sound waves. For two turns, the target is prevented from recovering HP through moves, Abilities, or held items.

Upper Hand.description: The user reacts to the target's movement and strikes with the heel of its palm, making the target flinch. This move fails if the target is not readying a priority move.

Malignant Chain.description: The user pours toxins into the target by wrapping them in a toxic, corrosive chain. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

Shadow Rush.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.

Shadow Blast.description: Has an increased chance for a critical hit.

Shadow Blitz.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Shadow Bolt.description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

Shadow Break.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Shadow Chill.description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.

Shadow End.description: User receives 1/2 its HP in recoil.

Shadow Fire.description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Shadow Rave.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Shadow Storm.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Shadow Wave.description: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

Shadow Down.description: Lowers the target’s Defense by two stages.

Shadow Half.description: Halves HP of all Pokémon on the field.  Must recharge

Shadow Hold.description: Prevents the target from leaving battle.

Shadow Mist.description: Lowers the target’s evasion by two stages.

Shadow Shed.description: Removes Light Screen, Reflect, and Safeguard.

Shadow Sky.description: Changes the weather to Shadow Sky for five turns.
